discourse_list.title: Authorship & Author Consent Proofs - Pre-EIP discussion

content.content: gm, this is the pre-PR discussion for the NFT Authorship Standard. There is currently no standardized way to determine the author of an NFT, and common techniques (custom methods and using the minter’s address) have serious drawbacks. This standard provides a standardized JSON field for author information, in addition to Author Consent Proofs (ACPs), which prove that an address agreed to be named as the author. You can find the draft here.
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of the NFT Authorship Standard proposal, which aims to provide a standardized way to determine the author of an NFT. The author is explaining the proposal and providing a link to the draft. A third party could give constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
